long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Automatically mutes & / or helps you skip Youtube ads faster. It does not block ads.

It will:
Mute, & immediately show the skip button for skipable ads.
For unskipable ads, it will mute them for the duration of the ad.
It will automatically unmute the video once the ad is done or the skip button is clicked.
That's all there is to it.

It will not click the skip button.

This is great if you want to watch a playlist of songs without being interrupted between each song, or if you're trying to do a peaceful yoga session and then hip hop starts playing... need I say more. Makes for an all around better YouTube viewing experience.

No extra paid features, no unnecessary permissions. Just enjoy YouTube.

Known bugs:
Video stays muted when the skip button is pressed via touch screen rather than mouse click
